name: leaf-ui
author: Aaron Crockett
description: Leaf - UI. A Toolkit. A CSS agnostic solution with Tailwind support. Framework flexible, built to be easily ported to any framework by relying on CSS classes rather than options. Leaf can be used as a headless UI by overriding or using our default classes as hooks for your own styles. Leaf can be used with our default classes and provides easy overrides.
